a.xlink:title: Constructs the BlobAnimation widget. Initializes parameters, states, event handlers,...
Slot connected to window_position_timer_. Called frequently to check the window position....
Emitted when event processing is re-enabled after being disabled.
Gets the main background color.
Gets the color used for the blob animation.
Gets the color for the background grid lines.
Gets the spacing between background grid lines in pixels.
Gets the singleton instance of the WavelengthConfig.
Slot connected to resize_debounce_timer_. Called after a short delay following resize events....
Switches the blob's current animation state (Idle, Moving, Resizing). Updates the current_blob_state_...
Initializes the blob's state (control points, target points, velocity, center) based on current param...
Emitted periodically during window movement to provide samples for velocity calculation....
Emitted when the inactivity counter exceeds a threshold, indicating that window movement has stopped.
Slot connected to state_reset_timer_. Called after a period of inactivity in Moving or Resizing state...
The main function executed by the physics simulation thread. Enters a loop that repeatedly calls upda...
Emitted during a resize event to request a specific "resizing" state in the Blob animation.
Emitted when the calculated velocity exceeds a threshold, indicating significant window movement.
Emitted when a significant resize event is detected after throttling.
Emitted after a resize event to request resetting any temporary state timers.
Emitted when a transition (e.g., to idle state) completes.
Slot connected to animation_timer_. Called periodically (~60 FPS) to update the animation state....
Emitted when a significant window move event is detected after throttling.
Deleted copy constructor.
Resets the blob's position to the center of the widget and regenerates its shape. Clears velocities a...
Generates a set of points forming an organic, blob-like shape around a center point....
Slot (or helper called by physics thread) to update the blob's physics simulation....
Enforces minimum and maximum distance constraints between neighboring control points....
Handles collisions between blob control points and the widget borders. Adjusts positions and reverses...
Applies a smoothing filter to the blob's shape. Moves each control point slightly towards the average...
Slot (or helper called by updateAnimation) to process the window movement buffer via BlobTransitionMa...
